website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Solar RNR is mainly a basic road running shoe that gets a premium performance from its ultra-breathable upper and the presence of the impressive Boost midsole. Runners can get a versatile trainer in this shoe with decent arch support, superior comfort, and dynamic responsiveness.
pros: Most of the comments noted how comfortable the Solar RNR is
The flexibility is excellent with a touch of stability
Several runners valued its versatility as a trainer and as a race day option
The Boost midsole delivers unique and innovative responsiveness
The breathability of the upper makes it ideal for hot weather excursions on the road
A significant number of runners loved its design and appeal
cons: It runs a bit narrow, according to a few reviews
Some runners wanted better traction on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters, knees hurt, but look great.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look nice, but when I ran in them I got blisters on the inside of both of my arches. I've had for about 6 months and aside from the blisters they are still in good condition. Update: I've been running more often in these (5+ miles) and they are NOT good support. I brought these into a running shop and they basically laughed at me for using these. They recommend not wearing these for any distance over 3 miles, and that would be pushing it. I noticed my knee has been hurting a lot. I've pinpointed it to these shoes. Despite this, I still think they are great looking shoes for walking around/lounging around, just not for long-distance running.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am 215 pounds and a lifter. I run occasionally to have the ability to move my heavy body quickly and for my health. If your a straight runner go with the pure boost. I bought these because of price and I only run about 30 - 40 miles a month. Recently I ran for charity and ran 9.19 miles in these shoes. No injuries and recovered the next day. Amazing Value! As a bonus these shoes look extremely good working out and in casual clothes.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light in weight. Maybe it's because I wear boots for work, but when I wear these shoes it feels very light. Word of advice these shoes are made from a light fabric, so do not wear on a rainy day or your feet will be soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Giggsy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, the heel is great and lessened the impact ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear nothing but Nike Lunar Glides because thats what worked, till they got too expensive. These though, light, comfortable, the heel is great and lessened the impact of constant walking for 10 hours. My feet hurt but then again they always do, but not as much as usual. I may even buy another pair. Only complaint is the backs trap along the Achilles tends to fold in when you are putting it on, but thats pretty minor.
customer_reviews.author: bmit

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Mesh
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the most comfortable pair of shoes I've owned. HOWEVER, the mesh wore out within a month... A MONTH! I wound up with two giant holes in the toes. Still wear them 8 months later though, just because they're so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: DMeggs

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe. They are a great running shoe that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. They are a great running shoe that provides great cushion and support. I primarily use them for running on a treadmill, and they work great for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Wear a 10, ordered 9.5's, fit well! Look slick and are light and comfy. Just wish the price would drop to what some other sites sell them for but I was dead set on leaving Nike training and running shoes after developing knee problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Still dreaming...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish looks, comfy fit...almost as pillowie as my last pair of Adidas & my current Nike work/running shoes...I woulda got 2 pairs had they floated me hovering like my dream shoes...I'll keep trying as these are a solid bargain & well built...happy as I can be!
customer_reviews.author: Spudman

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable. Just wish they came in different colored ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Adidas and I am now an official fan of Adidas sneakers. These are super comfortable. Just wish they came in different colored soles than light grey.
customer_reviews.author: GChi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these running shoes they are very comfortable and look great on at an very good price.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are good but as others have said the tongue is doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good but as others have said the tongue is doesn't stay in the shoe and tends to constantly pop up and out, even with the laces in the top hole. Some people like that I guess, but be aware before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not fitting as expected for "boost"
customer_reviews.text: Almost going to return but like the looks of them enough to wait till I'm sure of the fit. Will try them on again and walk round the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lab

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy. I can wear these shoes all day ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. I can wear these shoes all day without my feet hurting. I get compliments on them frequently. The only downside is that the ventilation isn't great (compared to the models with the larger mesh). I wear Nike Dri-Fit socks and there isn't enough ventilation to allow the moisture out.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the way they looked for my husband that usually ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way they looked for my husband that usually wears a 10 1/2 but they were at least one full size too big.

customer_reviews.title: These are great, they were just a little too wide for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they were just a little too wide for my feet, so I had to return them. Love the design, though.

customer_reviews.title: The fit and feel of the shoe is amazing, but the edge of the tongue of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and feel of the shoe is amazing, but the edge of the tongue of the shoe sticks out. Also, I can feel the edge of the padding in the shoe every once in a while.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and price 11.5 is my normal shoe size and they fit perfect

customer_reviews.title: hands down one of the best pairs of training shoes I've invested in
customer_reviews.text: hands down one of the best pairs of training shoes I've invested in. The sole of the shoe is amazing.

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is so comfortable and stylish too
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable and stylish too. Great for summer as it is lightweight and breathable. I love them.

customer_reviews.text: Hubs purchased these a few months back and LOVES them. I spy him wearing them pretty much every time he goes to they gym.

customer_reviews.text: Fits s little small at first but it conforms to ur foot.

customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy shoes! However if you buy them and are looking for them to run a half size bigger they dont. Beyond that they are great! Sad I only bought 1 pair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes for running, will buy another pair when needed

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his shoes. Fits true to size. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: TLDR - shoes so nice I bought'em twice
customer_reviews.text: TLDR - shoes so nice I bought'em twice. I've had trouble with finding shoes that fit my feet all my life. It doesn't help that depending on the brand and model, the sizes can fluctuate anywhere between 9.5 all the way to an 11. So when I had the opportunity to try these shoes on at an actual store before I bought them I jumped at the chance and I found them SUPREMELY COMFORTABLE AND FUNCTIONAL. On the plus side they didn't look like a god awful neon or rainbow like other running/walking shoes. I bought my first pair later that day and then I bought this pair a week or 2 later.
customer_reviews.author: Stanford K.

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and the feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the feel. I chose the wrong size. I'm in between a size 10.5 and a 11. I got the 11 and they were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be a good shoe for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son for track. They seem to be a good shoe for training
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purdy Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them a lot, he's on his feet all day and says his shoes don't make his feet hurt like the previous ones he had.

customer_reviews.title: it's like being barefoot
customer_reviews.text: So light and comfy, it's like being barefoot. Quoted from my husband.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great running shoe if I actully ran looks even better in person

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and are the comfort that one expects from adidas boost.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my son he's 15 and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son he's 15 and he loves them !!! "Like walking on clouds."
customer_reviews.author: kyle henkle

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes that look great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Light, fast and comfortable. Not as "bouncy and padded" sole as Adidas' flagship "foam sole" shoes, but more than enough for my liking - and better if you intend to wear casually as well as for running.
customer_reviews.author: ArisTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, very comfortable, lightweight and very breathable! Gives your feet a breeze

customer_reviews.title: Big but still great
customer_reviews.text: I should have gone a lil smaller too a ten but they still fit well and fell great
customer_reviews.author: tye mcneill

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis shoes of 2015 probably, all of the Adidas Boost line are great and by far the most confortable shoes out there right now. Perfect fit, soft, nice colours for running or wearing casual. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: alvinscm

customer_reviews.title: 12.5 is a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: 12's have always been to small and 13's too big so I tried the 12.5 here and they are perfect. I can walk, run, stand pretty much all day. They are light and breathe very well so in colder temps your feet may get chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but...
customer_reviews.text: I gifted these shoes to my boyfriend on his birthday. The product is really good. The only issue I had with it was the shoe is half size smaller than regular sizing because it is narrow at the toe. Also, the bottom red sole came out in 2 days. So I had to return the shoe and ordered a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Madhura

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes they are the best I've had in a while. extremely lightweight and comfortable. I would they look better in person actually. however I believe they run a 1/2 size small. Also they are mesh so you can see the color of your sock on the toe if that is a problem for some people. overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tongue of shoe is down to the shoe body and ...
customer_reviews.text: Tongue of shoe is down to the shoe body and therefore difficult to put on. Never saw an excercise shoe designed in this way. Bill
customer_reviews.author: bwoolam

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is that the tongue tapers too quickly into ...
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the tongue tapers too quickly into the shoe so the lip doesn't tuck in the sides causing the tongue to stick out. Hard to explain. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes, so much so I have purchased in other colors through Amazon and elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of running shoes. Very light and flexible with good support. One of the best sneakers I've purchased in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Fairly easy to clean too
customer_reviews.text: I where these sneakers almost everyday to work. I love them. Fairly easy to clean too. I do scrub the white parts though. I normally wear a size 12 sneaker and I bought the size 12 for this one too. It fits perfectly, not too tight, not too loose.

customer_reviews.title: Very much like the way they look
customer_reviews.text: Very much like the way they look. I read reviews so I expected that the mesh would be see through but if you wear black socks like I do, it's not a big deal.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe! The best "boost" show I have ever worn!

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes Best I've had in a long
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes Best I've had in a long time

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe, just order half a size down
customer_reviews.text: Extreme comfort but does run 1/2 size big. So if you wear a 10.5, order size 10

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, and cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits just right. Overall great shoe for the price. Paid 89.95, which I thought was cheap for a pair of good quality running shoes. Also very light and boost technology on the bottom of the heels make these shoes comfortable to wear. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Jd

product_meta.title: Adidas Performance Solar Rnr M Running Shoe,black/black/clear Onix Grey/grey,6.5 M Us
product_meta.description: Traverse the city streets or hit the gym in the fresh vibes of the adidas® Solar Boost running shoe! Built for the neutral runner. Breathable, braided mesh upper with synthetic overlays. Lace-up closure. Lightly padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Removable molded EVA insole. Lightweight EVA midsole supplies daylong underfoot cushioning. Boost™ under the heel provides lightweight plush and energy return with each stride. Lightweight, flexible STRETCHWEB rubber outsole adapts to the ground for a boost in stability. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 12 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Lace-up upper with striped overlays for centralized support
Molded synthetic midfoot and heel overlay
FITFRAME 3D-molded TPU for stability and comfort
